body.p: The 2010 Conceptual Framework did not discuss what a reporting entity is; nor did it describe how to determine what a reporting entity comprises. In developing concepts on the reporting entity for the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the Board considered comments received on the 2010 Exposure Draft developed jointly with the FASB and comments received on the 2015 Exposure Draft.
